channel.title: Need a countdown timer
channel.description: I'm trying to make my server say Server Restart in **:**. It would say something like Server Restart in 12:39, meaning the server will restart in 42 minutes and 39 seconds. I tried coding it myself. Yeah didnt work out to well.I saw a tutorial on this somewere but I can't find it. Thanks,

item.title: Need a countdown timer
item.dc:creator: @jeremie9299 jeremie9299
item.description:
@jeremie9299 wrote:

No thats not what I wanted. I want it so that it starts a univeral countdown from 45:00 to 00:00. Also the countdown cant be so that if you log in 15 minutes and 30 seconds into the time that the server went up, it wont say Server Restart in 45:00, it will say Server Restart in 14:30 and so on, you get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a countdown timer
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

If you do that then the people who will try to login it will say “server is being updated please wait 1 min and try again” So yeah if you do that and someone logs out, the person can no longer log back in until the update timer is done

Read full topic

item.title: Need a countdown timer
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Have you tried ::update 30 yet?

I’m trying to make my server say Server Restart in :. It would say something like Server Restart in 12:39, meaning the server will restart in 42 minutes and 39 seconds. I tried coding it myself. Yeah didnt work out to well.I saw a tutorial on this somewere but I can’t find it.
